LADIES' CODE

Introduction

Kim Joomi, formerly known for her stage name Zuny, is a South Korean singer under Actorsaid Entertainment. She made her official debut in 2013 as the maknae of the girl group Ladies' Code under Polaris Entertainment.

Following her contract expiration with Polaris Entertainment in 2020, she transfered to Actorsaid Entertainment and started promoting with her birth name Joomi.
